sourceMeaningMnemonic: Under the <radical>tree</radical> lies a <radical>turkey</radical> with a broken <radical>arrow</radical> in it. It doesn't have <kanji>rights</kanji> like humans, so people can just shoot turkeys with arrows and no one is punished.
meaningInfo: Imagine if humans didn't have any rights, like this turkey. People could just gun each other down in the street and no one would be punished for it... oh wait. :/
readingMnemonic: "You have <kanji>rights</kanji>, so I won't shoot you like this turkey," says the voice of <reading>Ken</reading> (<ja>けん</ja>) the samurai, from above you in the tree.
readingInfo: He jumps down and picks the turkey up, the broken arrow sticking out of its neck. "Turkeys do not have rights, my friend. Just let this one go."
